Function reference

Design

Functions to create or interact with a Design object

rct_design() rd_design() obs_design()
Generates a Design object with the given specifications.
.new_Design()
(Internal) Create a new Design object.
.check_design_formula()
(Internal) Perform checks on formula for creation of Design.
.update_form_to_unit_of_assignment()
(Internal) Rename cluster/unitid/uoa in a formula to unit_of_assignment for internal consistency
.rename_model_frame_columns()
(Internal) Rename columns to strip function calls
unit_of_assignment() unitid() cluster() uoa() block() forcing()
Special terms in Design creation formula

Accessors/Replacers for Design

treatment() `treatment<-`() units_of_assignment() `units_of_assignment<-`() clusters() `clusters<-`() unitids() `unitids<-`() blocks() `blocks<-`() forcings() `forcings<-`()
Accessors and Replacers for Design objects
.bin_txt()
(Internal) Extracts treatment as binary vector if possible or else errors.
.binarize_treatment()
(Internal) Uses a @dichotomy to create a binary version of the
.convert_to_data.frame()
(Internal) Ensures replacement column for Design is a data.frame.
.update_structure()
(Internal) Replaces type columns in design with new
.update_call_formula()
(Internal) Updates des@call's formula with the currently defined variable names.
dichotomy() `dichotomy<-`()
Extract or replace dichotomy

Helper functions for extracting useful information

var_names()
Return names of variables defining the Design
var_table()
Table of variables identifying a Design
treatment_table()
Generate table of number of units/clusters within each treatment level
design_data_concordance()
Check for variable agreement within units of assignment
is_dichotomized() has_binary_treatment() is_binary_or_dichotomized()
Check if Design has access to a binary treatment

Conversion between Design types

as_rct_design() as_obs_design() as_rd_design()
Convert Design between types
.remove_forcing()
(Internal) Removes the forcing column entirely from a Design

Summary and print methods

show(<Design>)
Show a Design
summary(<Design>)
Create summary of Design object
print(<summary.Design>)
Print summary of Design object

Functions to create or interact with weights generated by WeighedDesign

ett() ate()
Generate Direct Adjusted Weights
.weights_calc()
(Internal) Worker function for weight calculation
.join_design_weights()
(Internal) Expand unit of assignment level weights to the level of the data
`+`(<WeightedDesign>,<numeric>) `+`(<numeric>,<WeightedDesign>) `-`(<WeightedDesign>,<numeric>) `-`(<numeric>,<WeightedDesign>) `*`(<WeightedDesign>,<numeric>) `*`(<numeric>,<WeightedDesign>) `/`(<WeightedDesign>,<numeric>) `/`(<numeric>,<WeightedDesign>) c(<WeightedDesign>)
